tier_verification: This case appears to be misclassified. Most claims describe strategic positioning, market expansion, and brand differentiation rather than functional optimization. This looks more like a tier 1 case focused on business model innovation (creating new accessible product experiences) rather than tier 1 capability improvement. The AI-enabled accessibility app represents a new way of engaging customers, not optimization of existing processes.
